name: Zombie Hunt
description:
Steve (player) is stuck in a dense forest  fulled with zombies inside lead him to the zombie free place which is inside the forest.

The compass will help in navigation to the nearest check point and to the destination

and the radar will show the presence of zombies , health, ammo.

CONTROLS:

Arrow and ASDW keys for navigation 

SPACE for jump

F key for Focus 

R key for Reload

Mouse 0 (left button)  to shoot 

Do play and let your reviews in comment sections...
